name: The Role of Diceboy
description:
Follow Diceboy as he goes on a journey to find his role within the world. 

The Role of Diceboy is a story-driven game where Diceboy must learn to make peace with his purpose.

This is my first game I've made, so I didn't get very far with it, but I had a lot of fun and learnt a lot :) All music and art (except for the dice on Diceboy's house) is original.
